title: SP PM Office visits Polyclinic to inquire after injured policeman
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 07 (APP):Superintendent of Police (SP) from the Prime Minister’s Office, Muhammad Iqbal Khan, visited Poly Clinic hospital on Monday to meet ASI Wali Khan, who is currently undergoing treatment.
According to a public relations officer, SP Iqbal Khan also met with the doctors treating the officer and received a briefing on his health.
The SP issued directives to ensure the best possible care for the injured officer.
“Police officers are like family to us, and all officers will receive equal care,” SP Iqbal Khan stated.
He commended the sacrifices made by the ICT Police officers for the protection of the city and its residents, expressing admiration for their bravery and dedication.
